Title: Officer Jay
Plot: Sarah gets arrested for drinking (cough syrup) and driving. After she is released from jail Sarah discovers the attraction between her sister Laura and the arresting officer. Meanwhile Brian tries to convince his partner Steve that he is bisexual.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,sexual material and other content that may offend
GuestStars: Rachel Germaine, Tanjareen Martin, Karen McClain, Rob Schrab, Kelli Dawn Hancock, Chris Tallman, Laura Hayes
